report.title: Taxon observation format for RESTful API
report.description: Report to support taxon-observations resource output for the RESTful API. Compatible with the standard report filter parameters.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences o join occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id -- for access to external_key #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and o.date_type in ('D','DD','O','OO','Y','YY','-Y','U') and (o.entered_sref_system ilike 'osgb' or o.entered_sref_system ilike 'osie' or o.entered_sref_system = '4326' or o.entered_sref_system = '27700') and o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key is not null #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

column.name: sensitive
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null then 'F' else 'T' end

column.name: gridreference
column.sql: case when o.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then null else replace(o.public_entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: east
column.sql: case when o.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then st_x(st_transform(st_centroid(public_geom), o.entered_sref_system::int)) else null end

column.name: north
column.sql: case when o.entered_sref_system in ('4326', '27700') then st_y(st_transform(st_centroid(public_geom), o.entered_sref_system::int)) else null end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case upper(o.entered_sref_system) when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' when 'OSIE' then 'OSI' else upper(o.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case o.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(o.public_entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(o.public_entered_sref, ' ', '')))/2) end end
